about_the_game:
"Banished Monsters" is a visual novel put together by some random guy.

Follow the story of a Fomorian bunny, a creature that gets banished to earth and has to adapt to earth and its lifestyle. The novel has some scenes that contain some level of violence that is not advised for younger audiences, you have been warned.

Key Features:
A somewhat horribly written adventure visual novel.
You can kill any of the characters.
Multiple endings depending on the choices you make.
Hand-drawn visuals.

Things to know before buying: Game won't display dialogue if in full screen; the game is about two hours long.

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains scenes of violence and gore  , not advised for younger audiences , or mature audiences that would deem such acts inappropriately.
